build.description: Full development agent with all tools. Implements features, fixes bugs, writes code.

plan.description: Read-only planning agent. Analyzes code, designs architecture, creates implementation plans.

reviewer.description: Code review specialist. Finds bugs, security issues, and suggests improvements. Read-only.

tester.description: Test writing specialist. Generates unit tests, integration tests, and edge case coverage.

refactorer.description: Refactoring specialist. Improves code structure, reduces duplication, optimizes performance.

debugger.description: Debugging specialist. Investigates errors, traces issues, and proposes fixes with evidence.

docs.description: Documentation writer. Creates READMEs, docstrings, API docs, and inline comments.
